mapper.insert:
insert into jm_xj2_tf (sid, cid, jb_no, op_rem, sal_no, op_dd, prd_sn, dmdel, delay_b, over_e, para_max, para_min, chk_para, chk_name,chk_value,qty_md,state,wk_no ) values
(#{jmXj2Tf.sid}, #{jmXj2Tf.cid}, #{jmXj2Tf.jbNo}, #{jmXj2Tf.opRem},#{jmXj2Tf.salNo},#{jmXj2Tf.opDd},#{jmXj2Tf.prdSn}, #{jmXj2Tf.dmdel},#{jmXj2Tf.delayB},#{jmXj2Tf.overE},cast(#{jmXj2Tf.paraMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL} as decimal(22,8)),cast(#{jmXj2Tf.paraMin,jdbcType=DECIMAL} as decimal(22,8)), #{jmXj2Tf.chkPara},#{jmXj2Tf.chkName},cast(#{jmXj2Tf.chkValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL} as decimal(22,8)),#{jmXj2Tf.qtyMd},#{jmXj2Tf.state},#{jmXj2Tf.wkNo})
